transcript: AI is going to be the biggest shift in our lifetime there's five major areas that I think it's going to completely turn on its head number one is the nature of work itself the second is how businesses operate the third is the economy overall the fourth is how we interrelate with one another on a romantic setting how we choose mates how we seduce how we have sex and finally the nature of life itself and how it actually extends to interplanetary life and whether or not aliens exist here on Earth I'm not a big hat guy but I think if you actually think through the logic there's some really alarming conclusions that you can come to
